name: Jump Race 3D (ZaherHa)
description:
Jump Race 3D is a small android game where you have to jump on platforms to finish the race before other racers do.
I have made this project on my own in two weeks with free assets from the internet.
This project is an open-source project, you can download it and update it from My GitHub
https://github.com/Ahmad-Zaher-Alhafi/Jump-Race-3D
Credits:
Characters were gotten from: https://free3d.com
UI from: https://www.kenney.nl/assets
